column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////THE BEST RAMEN IN HOUSTON.... PERIOD!!!!! Go! Eat! Be Merry! There's usually a wait because it's so indescribably good
column2: everyone wants some! If we're ever wondering what we're going to eat
column3: Jinya is almost always the answer! Not much else needs to be said
column4: except do yourself this favor! Please!
